statements: UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET vote = 1 WHERE voter_id = 'a4b43a9b-5b8d-4bc1-b4e1-6b5abe647f61';

UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE sender_address = '0x1234' AND recipient_address = '0xABCD';
